Hello,

I want to create a silverlight application with WCF RIA Services & MVVM.

Purpose of this application is creating user, user-role, area, region, market and many more...
which will work as configuration for other applications.

for that i need to give some CRUD operation with some master tables in database. 
I just wanted to know whether Prism approach would be better for this application ?

I would like to know your ideas/views/reference article on the same..!

with best regards,
Jay

I would recommend you use the Prism 4 and Silverlight Navigation Framework integration developed by Karl. Here is the link http://blogs.msdn.com/b/kashiffl/archive/2011/03/10/prism-4-region-navigation-with-silverlight-frame-navigation-and-unity.aspx.

Karl had both examples in Unity and MEF.

Hi,

Also you might find this blog from David Hill useful:

  • Prism And .Net RIA Services
